articles.author: Ortenca Aliaj
articles.title: Activist investors mount record number of attacks against companies - Financial Times
articles.description: More shareholders are picking proxy fights with businesses whose stock prices have languished
articles.content:
Companies faced a record number of attacks from activist investors in 2023 as disgruntled shareholders sought to oust directors or force the sales of businesses whose share prices had languished.
